name: Momoko-chan for Me: Minarai Kangofu Hen
overview: Momoko-chan for Me: Minarai Kangofu-hen is a visual novel focusing on a young male aspiring physician, the son of a famous doctor who has left on a vacation and entrusted the son with the management of certain hospital-related affairs. The game focuses exclusively on the relationship between the protagonist and a nurse-in-training named Momoko. The visual novel-like structure allows only limited interaction, which is mostly confined to making a choice that would affect subsequent scenes. Almost the entire game consists of various sex scenes with Momoko, with only a few images dedicated to other women.
